questions: Is there an old man in a fabric smock splattering paint in the image?
Is there a young man in wooden goggles and an oversized t-shirt in the image?
Does the image present a differentiation logic: an old man in a smock splattering paint alongside a young man in an oversized t-shirt and goggles?
Is the smock made of fabric?
Are the goggles made of wood?
model_output:
yes there is an old man wearing a fabric smock and splattering paint.
no there is no young man wearing wooden goggles; the goggles appear to be made of plastic.
yes the image shows an old man in a smock splattering paint next to a young man in an oversized t-shirt and goggles, highlighting a differentiation in their attire and possibly age.
yes the smock appears to be made of fabric as it has a texture and pattern typical for fabric materials.
no the goggles the characters are wearing do not seem to be made of wood, they appear to be a light-colored material likely plastic.
